data.name: RPGScenery - Hole Village Scene
data.detailed_description:
The village was built on the wall of a bottomless crater. The buildings and the roads connecting everything are supported by big wooden beams driven into the rocks. The villages entrance is on the surface, protected by a pile gate. From there a long staircase leads to the upper level of the village above the dizzying depth. This level is for commercial and community buildings, while the lower level is more for dwellings.

This DLC contains 3 battlemaps to help you to bring your TTRPG session to the next level
